title: AIMP2 MilkDrop2 w/Enhancer DSP ~Raventree3~
description:
"AIMP 2 MilkDrop 2"
_____________________________________________________________________________

This version of "AIMP 2" has "MilkDrop 2" and "Enhancer" plugins included.

These are both "Winamp" plugins that work very well with "AIMP 2".

The "Enhancer" plugin improves the sound of "AIMP 2" very much.

I chose "AIMP 2" over "AIMP 3" because the "ASIO" driver option in "AIMP 3" 
sometimes causes issues.

_____________________________________________________________________________

~Raventree3~
_____________________________________________________________________________


To change the visualization right click on the "Loaded Plugin" window of "AIMP 2"
and choose "AIMP Winamp Wrapper 0.3".You can also change skins here too.

Default visualization is "Milkdrop 2".

There are 42 pages of visualizations.

Approximately 1350 different "MilkDrop 2" visualizations.


To configure "MilkDrop 2" left click on the "Loaded Plugin" window of "AIMP 2".

_____________________________________________________________________________


To open "MilkDrop 2's" hotkey's/menu: Click on "MilkDrop 2" Window to own it
and then press the "f1" key.

Press "f1" again to exit menu.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Click on "Minimize" button and "AIMP 2" goes to a thin bar you can place at the top of your monitor.
If you use the "Bento" skin.
